page.title: 12A MIXED FARM AT HUNNINGHAM
page.content: Mr Hammon owns a large {mixed farm} in Hunningham. He has 700 acres or 300 hectares.He employs 4 workers full time and 3 workers half time and he thinks he will employ that many in 10 years time.3 of them live on the farm.He grows hay,silage for use on the farm.He grows wheat,barley, potatoes and oil seed rape to sell to merchants,as well as milk to the dairy. For animal food he grows rootcrops such as turnips and grass. He has 200 ewes,120 fresian cows and 3 Jerseys to make the milk more creamy. You need these skills to become a {farmer},a vet,a mechanic,patience and he also has to be good with animals. Mr Hammon said that he would recommend a career in agriculture to any young people because he enjoys farming.
